item.description:
For those that are driving:

There are some commercial spots in front of the Trident that you can park in after 7 pm. Show up a little early and wait in your car till then. Make sure to check the signs so you don't get a ticket. If you can't find me, call me at 617-319-6712.

See you there!

group.name: Boston Web Design (and Dev) Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Web Design April Meeting
